hero.title: Shape Your Future at SAMRAT
hero.subtitle: Premier Institute for Science, Management & Technology. Join a community of innovators and leaders.

principal.name: Dr. Rajesh Kumar Verma
principal.message: At SAMRAT, we don't just create graduates; we sculpt the leaders of tomorrow. Our focus on holistic development ensures that our students are ready to tackle the challenges of the modern world with ethics and innovation.
